workflow.workflowDescription: Runs all 4 WebLLM setup shortcuts in sequence for complete automation

parameters.NotificationText:
üöÄ Starting Complete WebLLM iOS Setup

This will run 4 automated shortcuts:
1. üìÅ Folder Organization
2. ü§ñ Model Download
3. üöÄ GitHub Deploy
4. ‚úÖ File Verification

‚è±Ô∏è Total time: 45 minutes
üíæ Storage needed: 3GB
üéØ Result: Complete WebLLM app on iOS

parameters.InputQuestion:
Before we start, confirm you have:

‚úÖ iOS 15+ (iPhone/iPad)
‚úÖ 3GB+ free storage
‚úÖ GitHub account (for deployment)
‚úÖ WiFi connection (for downloads)

Ready to begin the complete setup?
MultipleChoice: Only set up local app (skip GitHub)

parameters.NotificationText:
üìã Preparation Checklist:

1. **Free up storage**: Delete unused apps/media
2. **Connect to WiFi**: Model download is large
3. **Create GitHub account**: Go to github.com
4. **Import 4 shortcuts**: Use SETUP_GUIDE.md

Run this master shortcut again when ready!

üìÅ Step 1/4: Folder Organization

Creating WebLLM folder structure in iCloud Drive...

‚úÖ Step 1 Complete!

Folder structure created:
‚Ä¢ WebLLM_iOS_App/
‚Ä¢ models/
‚Ä¢ downloads/
‚Ä¢ temp/

Proceeding to Step 2...

ü§ñ Step 2/4: Model Download

Starting AI model download process (2.18GB)...

üì± Model Download Instructions:

1. **Select "Auto Download"** in the shortcut
2. **Wait for configuration files** to download
3. **For large files (2.18GB)**, you'll need to:
   - Use a computer with Git LFS, OR
   - Use iSH shell with the script, OR
   - Use alternative download methods

‚è±Ô∏è This step may take 30+ minutes

‚úÖ Step 2 Complete!

Model download setup ready.

Note: Large model files (2.18GB) need additional download.
See the download script in downloads/ folder.

Proceeding to Step 3...

üöÄ Step 3/4: GitHub Deploy

Deploying to GitHub Pages...

üì± GitHub Deployment:

1. **Open the GitHub Deploy shortcut**
2. **Choose method**:
   - GitHub Mobile (recommended)
   - iSH Shell (advanced)
   - Safari only (no apps)
3. **Follow on-screen instructions**

This creates your live WebLLM website!

‚úÖ Step 3 Complete!

GitHub deployment initiated.

Your site will be available at:
https://yourusername.github.io/webllm-app

(5-10 minutes to activate)

Proceeding to Step 4...

üì± Local iOS Setup (No GitHub)

Step 3: Add to Home Screen

1. **Open Files app**
2. **Navigate to WebLLM_iOS_App**
3. **Long press index.html**
4. **Share ‚Üí Add to Home Screen**
5. **Name: "WebLLM Chat"**

This creates a native iOS app!

condition.input: Only set up local app (skip GitHub)

parameters.NotificationText:
‚úÖ Step 4/4: File Verification

Running final checks...

üìã Verification Check:

1. **Open File Verification shortcut**
2. **Review all status indicators**
3. **Check storage space**
4. **Verify Home Screen setup**
5. **Read verification report**

This confirms everything is working!

üéâ WebLLM Setup Complete!

‚úÖ All 4 steps completed
‚úÖ App ready for use
‚úÖ Files properly organized

üöÄ **What you can do now:**
‚Ä¢ Use WebLLM Chat app on Home Screen
‚Ä¢ Chat with AI offline (after model download)
‚Ä¢ Visit your GitHub Pages site (if deployed)
‚Ä¢ Share your app with others

üéØ **Next steps:**
‚Ä¢ Complete model file downloads
‚Ä¢ Test all features
‚Ä¢ Enjoy your private AI assistant!

üí° Usage Tips:

‚Ä¢ **Close other apps** for best performance
‚Ä¢ **Keep device charged** - AI uses battery
‚Ä¢ **WiFi recommended** for model downloads
‚Ä¢ **3GB free space** for smooth operation
‚Ä¢ **iPhone 12+** for best experience

üîê **Privacy**: All AI processing happens on your device - nothing is sent to servers!

‚ú® **Pro Tip**: Add to Home Screen for native app experience!

üÜò Need Help?

üìö **Documentation:**
‚Ä¢ SETUP_GUIDE.md (included)
‚Ä¢ Each shortcut has detailed instructions

üîß **Common Issues:**
‚Ä¢ Model won't load ‚Üí Check storage space
‚Ä¢ App won't open ‚Üí Re-add to Home Screen
‚Ä¢ GitHub deploy fails ‚Üí Wait 15 minutes, check settings

üí¨ **Community:**
‚Ä¢ WebLLM: https://mlc.ai/web-llm/
‚Ä¢ iOS Shortcuts: Shortcuts gallery

Enjoy your WebLLM iOS app! ü§ñüì±
